医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
结构生物学揭示 DEV 噬菌体感染的秘密感染细菌的病毒是地球上最丰富的生物实体。例如，最近对美国浴室的 92 个淋浴喷头和 36 个牙刷进行的一项简单研究发现了 600 多种细菌病毒，通常称为噬菌体或噬菌体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Structural-biology-reveals-secrets-of-DEV-phage-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Structural-biology-reveals-secrets-of-DEV-phage-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f3f5294-74b5-4169-8c36-fb150888b9f6 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:16:32 -0400 Structural biology reveals secrets of DEV phage infection
新报告探讨了学校膳食收费政策的前景公立学校、非营利性私立学校和寄宿儿童保育机构可以参加国家学校午餐计划 (NSLP) 和学校早餐计划 (SBP)，该计划通过美国农业部提供联邦资助的膳食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-report-explores-the-landscape-of-school-meal-charge-policies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-report-explores-the-landscape-of-school-meal-charge-policies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f3950c0-b3e0-498f-9c1b-998610a441ff Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:09:28 -0400 New report explores the landscape of school meal charge policies
新研究揭示了视觉混乱如何影响大脑处理无论我们是盯着手机、书页还是桌子对面的人，我们关注的对象都不会是孤立的；我们的视野中总是有其他物体或人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-study-unravels-how-visual-clutter-affects-brain-processing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-study-unravels-how-visual-clutter-affects-brain-processing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d0187c1-12c6-40bc-9227-6db1f70fd4cd Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:05:05 -0400 New study unravels how visual clutter affects brain processing
AI 系统 BELA 彻底改变了 IVF 胚胎的评估威尔康奈尔医学院研究人员的一项研究表明，一种新的基于人工智能的系统可以仅使用胚胎的延时视频图像和母亲年龄来准确评估体外受精（IVF）胚胎的染色体状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/AI-system-BELA-revolutionizes-assessment-of-IVF-embryos.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/AI-system-BELA-revolutionizes-assessment-of-IVF-embryos.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0aca0070-e53f-4c7e-b542-ea24f3aed1ac Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:02:47 -0400 AI system BELA revolutionizes assessment of IVF embryos
FDA 资助推动火鸡寄生虫和潜在治疗方法的研究随着科学家们对致命寄生虫在火鸡群中从一个宿主转移到另一个宿主的能力有了更多的了解，一个长期存在的理论受到了质疑，并为新的预防措施打开了大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/FDA-funding-fuels-research-on-turkey-parasite-and-pottial-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/FDA-funding-fuels-research-on-turkey-parasite-and-pottial-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=470a1158-08f9-4553-b698-69100c09316f Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:00:35 -0400 FDA funding fuels research on turkey parasite and potential treatments
研究揭示了年轻用户沉浸式数字环境的隐藏风险虚拟宇宙是一个物理现实和数字现实之间界限模糊的空间，正在年轻人中兴起。截至 3 月，33% 的青少年拥有虚拟现实 (VR) 设备，13% 的青少年每周使用该设​​备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Study-reveals-hidden-risks-of-immersive-digital-environments-for-young-users.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Study-reveals-hidden-risks-of-immersive-digital-environments-for-young-users.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d6afe93-1ce8-44c7-843e-ee29358f3afd Tue, 22 Oct 2024 20:57:24 -0400 Study reveals hidden risks of immersive digital environments for young users
新的基因研究表明热量限制可延长小鼠的寿命和健康研究检查了热量限制 (CR) 和间歇性禁食 (IF) 对遗传多样性雌性小鼠健康和寿命的影响，结果表明 CR 比 IF 更能显着延长寿命。遗传因素在饮食限制如何影响衰老和健康方面也发挥了作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Caloric-restriction-extends-mouse-lifespan-and-health-in-new-genic-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Caloric-restriction-extends-mouse-lifespan-and-health-in-new-genic-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eeb5b180-700d-4bb5-80c3-01e6aabb22e2 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 19:08:00 -0400 Caloric restriction extends mouse lifespan and health in new genetic study
接骨木浆果汁可促进超重成年人的脂肪燃烧和肠道健康一项研究发现，超重成年人饮用富含花青素的接骨木浆果汁仅一周后，即可改善肠道微生物群，降低血糖水平，并增加脂肪氧化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Elderberry-juice-boosts-fat-burning-and-gut-health-in-overweight-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Elderberry-juice-boosts-fat-burning-and-gut-health-in-overweight-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98b31e87-ac4c-4fba-92f6-bae67e84f15b Tue, 22 Oct 2024 17:11:00 -0400 Elderberry juice boosts fat burning and gut health in overweight adults
拥有快乐的亲密伴侣有助于缓解老年压力加州大学戴维斯分校的最新研究表明，拥有快乐的亲密伴侣不仅可以提升我们的情绪，还可以帮助我们控制压力，尤其是随着年龄的增长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Having-happy-intimate-partners-can-help-manage-stress-in-old-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Having-happy-intimate-partners-can-help-manage-stress-in-old-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d37efd4b-030b-4ebf-9139-56163ea97467 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 14:58:30 -0400 Having happy intimate partners can help manage stress in old age
切断癌细胞获取脂肪的途径可能会增强癌症治疗范安德尔研究所科学家的一项研究报告称，切断癌细胞获取脂肪的途径可能有助于特定类型的癌症治疗更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Cutting-off-cancer-cells-access-to-fats-may-enhance-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Cutting-off-cancer-cells-access-to-fats-may-enhance-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c0ad60e-3502-4b75-886f-477638e22b47 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 14:51:47 -0400 Cutting off cancer cells' access to fats may enhance cancer therapy
